welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cloverleaf, where small-town charm meets big-city excitement. Known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals, we invite you to explore our unique shops, delicious cuisine, and endless outdoor activities. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in our charming city."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at William P Hobby Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at William P Hobby Airport, serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baytown Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for exclusive use by private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
